summary: Lilaram sells lottery tickets and one customer has hit the jackpot but dies of shock upon finding out that he has won. Now, Lilaram wants all the money, and so does everyone around him.
cast: Paresh Rawal|Om Puri|Riteish Deshmukh|Reema Sen|Rajpal Yadav|Sudha Chandran|Asrani|Shakti Kapoor|Arbaaz Khan|Innocent|Rasika Joshi|Sona Nair|Priyanshi|Bineesh Kodiyeri|Ravindranath|Rakhi Sawant|Paresh Bramhbhatt
title: Malamaal Weekly
